me nisa methek paudgalika wishwawidyala, wishwa widyala thula upadhi wikinima , pasal thula mudal ayakirima ee gatalu walata pilithurak na kiyana eka meka baluwata passe sandahan wenawa.ee wagema shishya naya krama yojana karala thiyenawa,ithin shishya naya yojana karata passe apata pahadili wenawa, dan shishya naya oona wenne salliwalata igena ganna thiyena kramayak athule kiyala.ee kiyanne thawaduratath me rate idiriyata hadana adhyapana kramaye naya aragena hari igena ganna puluwan, salli dila upadhi ganna puluwan upayak bawa eeken kiyanawa.kelinma kiyanne na, eeth ehema thamayi hamadama kiwwe, ee nisa me prathipaththi prakashaya api handuna gaththe ehema.
